Observed at: North Mountain 2:00 PM ADT Wednesday 12 April 2023

Humidity: 98 %

Wind: WSW 20 km/h gust 30 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 4 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers except a few flurries over higher terrain this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 4 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 12 April 2023
